title: Telespazio buys satellite systems engineering firm to push into UK market
summary: European space mission integrator Telespazio has bought British engineering and consultancy firm e2E to play a bigger role in plans to expand the U.K. satellite industry.

title: U.S. advisory commission: Intense U.S-China rivalry is ‘the new normal’
summary: An influential congressional advisory body warned in its annual report that strategic and systemic competition between the United States and China continues to intensify.

title: Sale of United Launch Alliance is nearing its end, with three potential buyers
summary: The sale would still have to be approved by the Federal Trade Commission.

title: Elon Musk says SpaceX should receive clearance to attempt second Starship launch this week
summary: SpaceX is pushing hard to launch the second spaceflight of its Starship rocket this week.

title: Europe needs to be strategic with its space ambitions, DLR head says
summary: Europe needs to choose its space priorities wisely and work to boost capabilities or face suffering overreach, a leading official says.
